elements.title: Mimodactylus (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Mimodactylus (reconstruction pictured) is the first complete pterosaur from the Afro-Arabian continent?

elements.title: models of communication (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that one of the earliest models of communication was developed by Aristotle?

elements.title: went on strike (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that African porters in Salvador, Bahia, went on strike after the provincial government passed a law requiring them to wear metal identification tags?

elements.title: 1973 Brooklyn hostage crisis (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that one NYPD captain called the 1973 Brooklyn hostage crisis the "birthplace of hostage negotiation"?

elements.title: Akiho Suzumoto (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Japanese voice actress Akiho Suzumoto can recite 70 digits of pi from memory?

elements.title: Women Philosophers in the Long Nineteenth Century (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that one reviewer for Women Philosophers in the Long Nineteenth Century was let down by the book's lack of poetry?

elements.title: Occleshaw House (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that since being left vacant the grade II–listed Occleshaw House in Leyland, Lancashire, has been used as an illegal cannabis farm and suffered a suspected arson attack?

elements.title: an Italian castle (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a wolf reportedly ate Boris Johnson's dongle at an Italian castle owned by a Russian billionaire?
